name: @cash-io/non-evm-contracts
description: Cash.io Bridge Contracts for Non-EVM Chains (Solana, Sui, NEAR)

scripts.install:tools: npm run install:solana && npm run install:sui && npm run install:near
scripts.install:solana: echo 'Install Solana CLI: sh -c "$(curl -sSfL https://release.solana.com/v1.18.0/install)" && cargo install --git https://github.com/coral-xyz/anchor anchor-cli --locked'
scripts.install:sui: echo 'Install Sui CLI: cargo install --locked --git https://github.com/MystenLabs/sui.git --branch mainnet-v1.24.0 sui'
scripts.install:near: echo 'Install NEAR CLI: npm install -g near-cli-rs && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown'
scripts.build:near: cd near && RUSTFLAGS='-C link-arg=-s' cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && mkdir -p res && cp target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/cashio_bridge_near.wasm res/
scripts.build:all: npm run build:solana && npm run build:sui && npm run build:near
scripts.test:all: npm run test:solana && npm run test:sui && npm run test:near
scripts.deploy:near:testnet: cd near && near deploy --accountId cashio.testnet --wasmFile res/cashio_bridge_near.wasm
scripts.deploy:near:mainnet: cd near && near deploy --accountId cashio.near --wasmFile res/cashio_bridge_near.wasm
scripts.deploy:all:testnet: npm run deploy:solana:devnet && npm run deploy:sui:testnet && npm run deploy:near:testnet
scripts.deploy:all:mainnet: npm run deploy:solana:mainnet && npm run deploy:sui:mainnet && npm run deploy:near:mainnet
